column2: Animated by vile magic, the bones of this once proud steed still show a reflection of the grace it possessed in life.
The fragile bones are protected by legion armour.
Built in the style of the Tomb Kings, only the highest officers of the Dread Legion will take to the battlefield on top of this chariot.
Once the Dread Legion had soldiers beyond counting. Now they lay beneath the sand, until their master calls them to battle once more.
The legion ever marches onwards to bring death to the living.
Neither grievous wounds nor death can hold down the favoured servants of Nagash for long.
The Dread King marches at the front of his legions to further the plans of his master, Nagash, and bring the blessing of death to the living.
